parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x position in the drawing sheet space for the center of the drawing view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y position in the drawing sheet space for the center of the drawing view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z position in the drawing sheet space for the center of the drawing view

parameters.name: NotAligned
parameters.description: True if you want to break the alignment with the parent view, false if you want to keep the view aligned with the parent view

title: IDrawingDoc.CreateUnfoldedViewAt3
description: Creates an unfolded drawing view from the selected drawing view and places it in the drawing at the specified location.
signature:
View CreateUnfoldedViewAt3( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
,
   System.Boolean
NotAligned
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x position in the drawing sheet space for the center of the drawing view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y position in the drawing sheet space for the center of the drawing view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z position in the drawing sheet space for the center of the drawing view

parameters.name: NotAligned
parameters.description: True if you want to break the alignment with the parent view, false if you want to keep the view aligned with the parent view

returns: Pointer to the newly created IView object
